description:
Something strange has happened to Dororo: he seems to have turned back into the scary Assassin he used to be!  Later, Koyuki seems to have a scary secret.  Her friends all gather together to spy on her and figure out what it is!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dororo, Invasion is My Mission! / Koyuki`s Se-cre-t
ドロロ 侵略こそ我が使命! / 小雪 のヒ・ミ・ツ....
